#cloud-config manage_etc_hosts: true hostname: vnf-vpc-em-1 local-hostname: vnf-vpc-em-1 chpasswd: { expire: False } network: config: disabled ssh_pwauth: True password: $6$K3wT5ZFFi$thCOHNTlIUT/XDyaxh8cGdUBd4z83520rFbGhhasq7fvlWhVAIfb8zD.UH9giKY1EKywCWX5F/MWaJirtn4Ds1

chassis key value Cisco.123 config cli hidden tech-support test-commands password boxer cli test-commands password boxer system hostname TEST_UPF01_CS01 ssh key-gen wait-time 0 context local administrator admin password Cisco.123 ftp administrator emuser password Cisco.123 ftp interface LOCAL1 ip address 128.1.1.211 255.255.0.0 #exit ip route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 128.1.1.252 LOCAL1 ip domain-lookup ip domain-name bxblab.com ssh generate key server sshd subsystem sftp #exit server confd confd_user emuser #exit server telnetd server ftpd #exit port ethernet 1/1 bind interface LOCAL1 local no shutdown #exit snmp community public read-only end
